What are the treatments for central core disease ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of central core disease:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Central Core Disease  - Genetic Testing Registry: Central core disease  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Hypotonia  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Malignant Hyperthermia   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:
